reviews.review: Лучший Командный шутер от Valve, на ровне с тфкой. Жалко нет СССР и транспорта. А так, игра шикарная

норм игруха, можно порубиться когда нечего делать. Правда основное комьюнити это деды и мужики которым по 30-40 лет.

Been playing this game for years and couldn't be happier.  Even 10 years later it is still fun to join a server and play capture the flag all night long.  Absolute classic!

[b]Welcome to a blast from the past, a game related to World War 1 or something.[/b]

If you played CS:GO or TF2, you will fit into this game really well. In this game, you only have one objective which is to capture every flag in the map with your team. In some cases, you would need the help of a teammate to cap a flag. You have the option to choose between six classes, Rifleman, Assault, Support, Sniper, Machine Gunner and Rocket. You will often need to hide in your surroundings to sneak and kill people to get to your objective.

You will often be stuck in one server due to the lack range of servers (I had to hop into a US Server which somehow not cause lag so yay?) and you will find that the servers will not have kids playing the game, which is a good thing. It is also a bad thing as you will find kids being mocked for raging or even using the mic. Luckly, I'm not that kind of idiot, I'm the kind that would camp at flags... uh

Basically to sum this all up, this is a great game, hope it doesn't die like that one other Valve game called Ricochet (and maybe Artifact)
NIce ww2 game, fun to play.

Um jogo leve, incrível e imersivo

The community is the video game equivalent of a scale modeling convention. The active servers generally have a bunch of 40+ year old regulars conversing about their lives and trivia. Super chill.

Day of Defeat: Source is a nice game to play once in a while. The community is welcoming and the servers are full!

You can be on team wehrmacht and not feel like a friggin' nazi.  When you win a match you have about 20 seconds to commit war crimes and shoot the enemy team members because they're defenseless.  The banter between players is pretty funny.  The pace is slow, so it's good for anyone on downers.  I can play this game on my lap top -- my rig got stolen and I'm too poor to for anything modern for a while.  Good times overall I think.
o jogo é muito bom é leve e muita adrenalina nesse jogo , amei muito !!!

J'aime beaucoup ce jeu car on peux parler facilement et clairement avec les autres joueurs. Je ne parle par beaucoup mais j'aime écouter les autres blaguer durant le jeu. J'aime aussi ce jeu car la jouabilité n'est pas trop rapide, les cartes sont de plus en plus belle. C'est mon jeu FPS préféré devant battlefield.
